document.full_text: novak djokovic moved relentlessly into the indian wells semi-finals with a 6-2 6-4 victory over frenchman richard gasquet on friday, extending his perfect record this season to 16-0.
document.title: djokovic storms into last four at indian wells
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic moved relentlessly into the indian wells semi-finals with a 6-2 6-4 victory over frenchman richard gasquet on friday, extending his perfect record this season to 16-0.
